dmxeffects.sound
Class SoundModule

java.lang.Object
  dmxeffects.sound.SoundModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Module
public class SoundModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module

Sound module main file. Provides all interfaces from external classes to the functionality provided by this module.

Author:
chris

dmxInput

public void dmxInput(java.lang.Integer channelNumber,
                     java.lang.Integer channelValue)
Description copied from interface: Module
Method to inform the Module that dmxInput has been recieved. This method is called as a slot to a signal from the Universe class, so all data has previosuly been validated.

Specified by:
dmxInput in interface Module
Parameters:
channelNumber - The channel number upon which the input was recieved.
channelValue - The value recieved upon this channel.
